title: Moto Beach
fullContent: Home› DrivingMoto BeachBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenMoto Beach is an easy game where your mission is to take your motorbike to collect hoola hoops/packages around the beach and get extra bonuses.You should follow the instructions at every mission an have fun enjoying the beach paradise.Select Game Mode • Standard - Collect maximum rings to get highest scores, watch out for time • Island - Collect maximum rings to get highest scores, watch out for time • Transport - Deliver Cargo to the destination points, watch out for fuel level - 10 levels Moto Beach Controls:• WASD to control motorbike• C to change camera• Left shift to boostThis article was updated on December 20, 20231 Player3DBikeCozyCrazyDrivingFreeSpeedStunt
